feedbacks: Delhi is a city of contrasts. While it has a rich history, the traffic and pollution can be overwhelming.
The food in Delhi is amazing! I loved trying different street foods.
I had a great time exploring Delhi's historical sites and learning about its culture.
Mumbai is a bustling metropolis with a vibrant nightlife. However, it can get crowded and noisy.
The street food in Mumbai is a must-try, but be cautious about hygiene.
Mumbai has a unique charm, and the people are welcoming and friendly.
Jaipur's historical sites are stunning, but the summers can be scorching hot.
The shopping in Jaipur is fantastic, and you can find beautiful handicrafts.
Exploring Jaipur's palaces feels like stepping back in time.

The nightlife in Goa is legendary, with plenty of clubs and bars to choose from.
Water sports in Goa are thrilling, and I had an amazing time jet-skiing.

The Bengali cuisine in Kolkata is a treat for foodies. Don't miss trying the sweets!
Shopping in Kolkata's markets is a delightful experience, and you can find unique items.
New York City is a vibrant and diverse city with something for everyone.
The theater scene in NYC is incredible. Don't miss a Broadway show!
While NYC is amazing, it can be expensive, so plan your budget accordingly.
Tokyo is a blend of modernity and tradition. Explore both aspects of this incredible city.
Sushi lovers will be in heaven in Tokyo. Try sushi at local spots!
Tokyo's public transport is efficient, making it easy to get around.

Experience the energy of Carnival and the rhythm of Samba in Rio.
Be cautious in crowded areas to avoid pickpocketing.

Surfing enthusiasts will find great waves in Sydney's beaches.
Explore the local wildlife at Taronga Zoo.

Take a Nile cruise to explore ancient temples along the river.
Enjoy bargaining at Cairo's bustling bazaars for souvenirs.

A safari in nearby reserves offers a chance to see the Big Five.
Relax on Cape Town's beautiful beaches like Camps Bay.

Admire the art and architecture in Venice's historic sites.
Try authentic Venetian cuisine in local trattorias.
This was the most amazing trip I've ever been on! I loved the food, the culture, and the people.
Paris is a beautiful city with so much to see and do. I highly recommend visiting!
I had a wonderful time in Paris. The city is so romantic and there is so much to do and see. I would definitely recommend it to anyone.
Bali is a paradise for beach lovers. The beaches are stunning!
Surfing in Bali is a thrilling experience. Try it even if you're a beginner.
Exploring Bali's temples gives you insights into its rich culture.
